title: Wild Arms Twilight Venom
alternative_title: ワイルドアームズ トワイライトヴェノム
description: Wild Arms exploits the tales of Sheyenne Rainstorm, a deadly gunslinger trapped in the body of a 10-year old boy. Together with bandit Kiel Aronakus, card-throwing dame Loretta Oratorio, vampire girl Mirabelle Graceland and a weird creature named Jerusha, Sheyenne embarks on a long journey to find out about his lost past and figure out who placed him in his current body.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Vampire>]
